card.title: Most likely to vote the same

info.lead: List of 5 MPs that most often vote the same as the "vote of the parliamentary group". MPs are ranked in an ascending order. The lower the value, the bigger the commonalities between the two MPs.
text: We calculate the Euclidean distance between the results of a parliamentary group's voting and everyone else's voting (votes are converted to numerical values between -1 and 1).
When we calculate the "distance" between all the MPs we rank them based on result and show the top 5.
